snippet: Deutsche Bank has appointed a syndicate of other banks to run the its multi-billion euro rights issue, two sources familiar with the matter said on Sunday....

headline.print_headline: Deutsche Bank Appoints Syndicate for Rights Issue: Sources
headline.main: Deutsche Bank Appoints Syndicate for Rights Issue: Sources

lead_paragraph: Deutsche Bank has appointed a syndicate of other banks to run the its multi-billion euro rights issue, two sources familiar with the matter said on Sunday.
